item.title: Powershell Constrained Mode Bypass With Meterpreter
item.description: The powershell extension for meterpreter likely isn’t a well known feature of the meterpreter shell. Most pentesters are likely to just run powershell from the command shell that meterpreter launches with the shell command instead of loading the extension. But this can be problematic for environments that lock down Powershell.

item.title: Proxmox ZFS Drive Replacement
item.description: Drive replacement is an inevitable task with computers and one that can be nerve-wracking when you aren’t well prepared for it. I recently had a drive failure on the root filesystem of one of my Proxmox1 hypervisors. In my installation, Proxmox makes use of a two drive mirrored ZFS file system for it’s root partition. This post is as much to ensure the notes I took to recover from the degraded volume are easy for me to find as to share the steps to hopefully make someone elses life easier in the future.
